column7: Basic calculations in elementary particle theory. Quantum electrodynamics, quantum chromodynamics, and the Glashow-Weinberg-Salam theory of weak and electromagnetic interactions as applied to the phenomenology of particle decays and high energy reactions. 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: Recommended: credit or concurrent registration in PHYS 582.
column9: 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: Recommended: credit or concurrent registration in PHYS 582.
